questions.question: What kind of integration are you looking for? [a] Of internal services, [b] of external clients, or [c] of external systems (generic)
Between the architectural techniques and strategies [a] isolation, [b] specialization, [c] decomposition, and [d] proxying, which is the most suitable for your needs?
What is the domain of pattern your are looking for?

Is your solution primarily focused on internal processes, or does it involve external interactions?

What cost factors are most critical to your solution? For example, latency, complexity, or potential points of failure?
